statements.statement: SELECT /*+ 박재훈::/gcb/batch/itOpSpt/smsNotf/itOpSmsTrsHisDelJob/ItOpSmsTrsHisDel/retvItOpSmsTrsHisNcn */ COUNT(1) 건수_N10 FROM INSTC.TBGCBSM04 A /* GCB_IT운영SMS전송내역 */ WHERE A.IT운영SMS전송년월일 < ${작업기준년월일}
DELETE /*+ 박재훈::/gcb/batch/itOpSpt/smsNotf/itOpSmsTrsHisDelJob/ItOpSmsTrsHisDel/delItOpSmsTrsHis */ FROM INSTC.TBGCBSM04 /* GCB_IT운영SMS전송내역 */ WHERE IT운영SMS전송년월일 < ${작업기준년월일} AND ROWNUM <= 100
